title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-2.9 - Raw fruits and raw vegetables
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-2.9 - Raw fruits and raw vegetables

State Regulations

Raw fruits and raw vegetables that will be cut or
combined with other ingredients or will be otherwise processed into food
products by the retail food store shall be thoroughly cleaned with potable
water before being used. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-2.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
